thread.title_full: Donald Trump has the world s worst handshake Yahoo7 Be - Yahoo7

author: Aletha Wilkinson
title: Donald Trump has the world s worst handshake Yahoo7 Be - Yahoo7
text:
Share Donald Trump has the world s worst handshake Yahoo7 Be - Yahoo7 
It's fair to say that Donald Trump has had quite the rollercoaster ride in his first few weeks as President of the United States. Trump has world's worst handshake UP NEXT VIDEO Trump has world's worst handshake. Trump has world's worst handshake 
The inauguration was a goldmine of hilarious moments, and his Twitter account has been running hot. But nothing tops the horror of this handshake. You don't need to drag the other person towards you, Donald. Source: C-SPAN 
No one could have foreseen the bizarre turn that Judge Neil Gorsuch's nomination to the Supreme Court would take. It all started innocently enough. Source: C-SPAN 
But when Trump took his hand to shake for the cameras, there was a twist. The handshake begins. Source: C-SPAN 
The handshake just wouldn't end. Not only would Trump not release Gorsuch's hand, but he physically pulled him in closer. Donald! Let go! Let go right now! Source: C-SPAN 
Predictably enough, Twitter lit up like a Christmas tree over Trump's bizarre display of dominance. Donald Trump and his #SCOTUS nominee have a secret handshake. It's a real corker. pic.twitter.com/3yihbbi9Lk â€” Jeff Stanger (@jeffcdi) February 1, 2017 I'm sorry but Trump's awkward handshake is never going to top this one. pic.twitter.com/PqjZPaSCBD
